products.title: Blossom Dress
products.text: Do you like some random yellow stuff? Here's one for you.

products.title: Black Monastery
products.text: The best beer comes from the monastery.

products.name: Mocade
products.title: Black Mocade
products.text: Hey look up! It's a plane! No, It's a bird! No, it's the assassin performing leap of faith.

products.name: zipper
products.title: No zipper dress
products.text: The price of this dress has been cut off since we lost the zipper on the back.

products.name: ernest
products.title: Dear Ernest
products.text: We'll bring readers to the edge of ther seats and keep them there until we sell this dress.
